question: Which answer correctly matches the tool to the processing step?

answers.answer: picard: filtering low quality reads. samtools view: organize the bam file by coordinate. samtools sort: duplicate removal.
samtools sort: filtering low quality reads. samtools view: organize the bam file by coordinate. samtools sort: duplicate removal.
samtools view: filtering low quality reads. picard: organize the bam file by coordinate. samtools sort: duplicate removal.
samtools view: filtering low quality reads. samtools sort: organize the bam file by coordinate. picard: duplicate removal.
answers.feedback: Yes. samtools view can be used for many functions depending on the options that you use. We used the -q option to impose a quality filter.
